name: Tom
text: I really like this shirt! Super great for cardio activities because it's super light and fits very well. But if you are a very heavy sweater, definitely consider another shirt. Although it does wick sweat well, it's pretty easy to saturate this shirt due to the super light material. It does dry fast though.

name: Scott
text: It’s so hard to find a 3” short with a decent sized cell phone pocket. These are great. They should add a key pocket inside though or a gel pocket.

name: Julie
text: Bought this for my brother in law and he really liked it. Beautiful color!
